mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.label AS "label", a.key AS "key", a.value AS "value", a.type AS "type", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.service AS "service", a.module AS "module", a.project AS "project", a.system AS "system", a.sync_method AS "syncMethod", a.sync_system AS "syncSystem", a.sync_date AS "syncDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_config( id, name, label, key, value, type, parent_id, parent_ids, service, module, project, system, sync_method, sync_system, sync_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{label}, #{key}, #{value}, #{type}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{service}, #{module}, #{project}, #{system}, #{syncMethod}, #{syncSystem}, #{syncDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_config SET name = #{name}, label = #{label}, key = #{key}, value = #{value}, type = #{type}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, service = #{service}, module = #{module}, project = #{project}, system = #{system}, sync_method = #{syncMethod}, sync_system = #{syncSystem}, sync_date = #{syncDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
